title: Safe deposit box access logs
dataVerified: Box holder name, box number, access date/time, witness name (notary or bank officer), access purpose, notary/officer signature
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Link to bank system (estate executors and attorneys, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered access logs in estate disputes. Domain binding verifies bank legitimacy. Estate disputes often involve post-death safe deposit box access. Prevents unauthorized box access fraud through tamper-evident logs. Witness verification by notary or bank officer proves legitimate access. Critical for estate administration where access logs prove who accessed box and when after death. Banks maintain permanent records of all box access for legal proceedings.
